results.deck: 25 to Life is a third person shooter video game that allows players to play cops and robbers.
results.name: 25 to Life

results.deck: The second game to be released in the Sled Storm series.
results.name: Sled Storm
Dance Dance Revolution Disney CHANNEL EDITION

results.deck: NFL QB Club 2002 is the eighth game in the American football Quarterback Club series.
results.name: NFL QB Club 2002

results.deck: Enter Silent Hill for the first time, as redneck trucker Travis Grady explores the haunted town and discovers how true evil began.
results.name: Silent Hill: 0rigins

results.deck: Pac-man Fever is a mini-game collection that brings together various Namco characters to compete on various board game levels.
results.name: Pac-Man Fever

results.deck:
Mashed: Fully Loaded is the expanded release of the original Mashed: Drive to Survive. Race against CPU opponents or friends. Use all manner of weapons to blow stuff up and avoid being blown up yourself. 
Mortars, Missile launchers, Flamethrowers, Drum bombs and more are the key to winning.
results.name: Mashed: Fully Loaded

results.deck: This collection includes 28 Sega Genesis / Mega Drive games on one budget-priced disc.
results.name: Sega Genesis Collection

results.deck: Space Invaders Anniversary celebrates the 25th anniversary of the oldest Taito franchise.
results.name: Space Invaders Anniversary

results.deck: Driv3r is a 2004 action game released by Atari and Reflections. You play as Tanner as he tries to sneak himself into a gang of car thieves and take them down from the inside.
results.name: Driv3r
SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.23: SEGA Memorial Selection

results.deck: Colin McRae Rally 04 is the fourth installment in the series and the first game in the series not to feature the WRC licensed teams and liveries.
results.name: Colin McRae Rally 04

results.deck: A remake of the PC first-person/third-person shooter Iron Storm.
results.name: World War Zero: Iron Storm
VeggieTales: LarryBoy and the Bad Apple

results.deck: A Zelda-like adventure in which an anthropomorphic cat named Kay must defend his peaceful home from a vicious invading army.
results.name: Legend of Kay

results.deck: The first motocross game on the PS2, which included modes such as career, freestyle and stunt.  Mini-games where also included.
results.name: MX 2002 featuring Ricky Carmichael

results.deck: A Tie-in game to the popular Wallace & Gromit feature Film, The Curse of the Were Rabbit is a Platforming game for the PS2 and Xbox with open world elements starring the popular British claymation Characters Wallace and Gromit.
results.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were Rabbit

results.deck: Take on the role of Jak, and embark on a long journey to change Daxter back from his ottsel form.
results.name: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy

results.deck: Open Season is a 3rd person plat-former based on the movie by the same name. Developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.
results.name: Open Season

results.deck: Tekken 4 is the fifth installment in the Tekken series. It was released for the arcades in 2000 and on the PlayStation 2 in 2002.
results.name: Tekken 4

results.deck: The sequel to Fight Night 2004. The game would focus on knockouts by adding Haymakers to the total punch control setup. The GameCube version had the Super NES game Super Punch-Out!! playable. In addition, you could unlock Little Mac as a playable character in the main game.
results.name: Fight Night Round 2

results.deck: A hunting game publised by Activision.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2005 Adventures

results.deck: Build the best fighter, and destroy the rest.
results.name: UFC: Throwdown

results.deck: The second game in the series developed by Evolution Studios using the official FIA WRC license.
results.name: WRC II Extreme

results.deck: Black Monday is a third person action game, set in London, and exclusive to the Playstation 2
results.name: The Getaway: Black Monday

results.deck: Crash Twinsanity is a Title in the Crash Bandicoot series in which you play as Crash and his Arch-Enemy Neo Cortex. The game features free-roaming levels and is less about collecting crystals, as in the previous games, and more about completing levels.
results.name: Crash Twinsanity

results.deck: In the 2004 edition of Sega's 2K series, the ESPN license is added, changing the presentation across the game.  Jeremy Roenick of the Philadelphia Flyers serves as cover athlete for the second year in a row.
results.name: ESPN NHL Hockey

results.deck: MTV Celebrity Deathmatch is a video game based off of the popular clay-mation television show. Playable characters include a myriad of celebrities such as Carrot Top, Mr. T, and Jerry Springer.
results.name: MTV Celebrity Deathmatch

results.deck: Ace Combat 5: The Unsung War is an arcade flight combat game. Escalating hostilities between the nation of Osea and its neighbor across the Pacific Ocean, Yuktobania, culminate in all out war between the two nations. The pilots of Wardog Squadron fight to restore peace between the embattled nations.
results.name: Ace Combat 5: The Unsung War

results.deck: Released originally in 2001, Spy Hunter is a remake of the 1983 classic arcade game.
results.name: Spy Hunter

results.deck: Shoot bad guys and rescue the hostages in this 1987 first-person Arcade light-gun shooter from Taito.
results.name: Operation Wolf

results.deck: The future is what we make it, so let's set the future right.
results.name: The Terminator: Dawn of Fate

results.deck: An entry in EA's soccer franchise released to coincide with the 2002 World Cup. It is very similar to the previously-released FIFA 2002, with a few additions and tweaks.
results.name: 2002 FIFA World Cup

results.deck: Go from a local unknown to a superstar skater in the fifth installment of the Tony Hawk franchise, adding a new story mode, new tricks (including wallplanting and the ability to travel on foot), and enhanced character creation (including face mapping and trick creation).
results.name: Tony  Hawk's Underground

results.deck: Guitar Hero II is the second entry into Harmonix's popular Guitar Hero franchise, adding more songs and several new gameplay features as well as bringing the franchise to the Xbox 360.
results.name: Guitar Hero II

results.deck: Hyper Street Fighter II combines the best of the franchise in to one, as you can choose to play as any version of the characters in the series.
results.name: Hyper Street Fighter II: The Anniversary Edition

results.deck: Yu-Gi-Oh Capsule Monster Coliseum is the second in the franchise on PS2.
results.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Capsule Monster Coliseum

results.deck: or Bear Song, play a polar bear that sings karaoke.
results.name: Kumauta

results.deck: Arcade tennis game known as Virtua Tennis 2 in Europe.
results.name: Tennis 2K2

results.deck: It's not mission difficult, it's Mission: Impossible.
results.name: Mission: Impossible - Operation Surma

results.deck: NHL 2001 was a hockey sim released by Electronic Arts in 2000 for the PC, the Playstaion, and the Playstation 2
results.name: NHL 2001

results.deck: Electronic Arts videogame based on the Arena Football League.
results.name: Arena Football

results.deck: It's a football game, yo.
results.name: ESPN NFL Primetime 2002

results.deck: NBA LIve 2005 is the 2005 version of the NBA Live Franchise.
results.name: NBA Live 2005

results.deck: Fight back against the Helghast invasion with your four man squad to save the Vektan colony.
results.name: Killzone

results.deck: Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana is a console role-playing game developed by GUST for the PlayStation 2. It was published in North America by NIS America and in Europe by KOEI. It is the first game in the Atelier series to get a release outside of Japan.
results.name: Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana

results.deck: After the sand on the beach mysteriously disappears, the Rocket Power kids must figure out what is going on.
results.name: Nickelodeon: Rocket Power - Beach Bandits

results.deck: A spin-off version of Guilty Gear X2, in which up to four players can fight AT THE SAME TIME. It's as chaotic as it sounds.
results.name: Guilty Gear Isuka

results.deck: A dark adventure filled with mysteries and mysticism.
results.name: Kuon

results.deck: A Playstation 2 remake of the first entry in the Sakura Taisen series, using updated game mechanics introduced in 3 and 4.
results.name: Sakura Taisen: Atsuki Chishio Ni
P.T.O.: Pacific Theater of Operations IV

results.deck: Fullmetal Alchemist 2: Curse of the Crimson Elixir is the second console role-playing game for the PlayStation 2 based on the series.
results.name: Fullmetal Alchemist 2: Curse of the Crimson Elixir

results.deck: Scooby-Doo!: Night of 100 Frights is the first Scooby-Doo video game on sixth generation consoles.
results.name: Scooby-Doo!: Night of 100 Frights

results.deck: Armored Core 3 takes place centuries after a global nuclear war forced humanity underground.  It is considered a reboot, completely unrelated to the events of the prior Armored Core games.
results.name: Armored Core 3

results.deck: An arcade flying game, pitting Snoopy against his mortal enemy, the Red Baron...
results.name: Snoopy vs. the Red Baron

results.deck: A fishing game for the GameCube and PlatStation 2
results.name: Top Angler: Real Bass Fishing

results.deck: Shellshock: Nam '67 is a third-person shooter set during the Vietnam War from the developers of Killzone.
results.name: Shellshock: Nam '67

results.deck: The second Resident Evil title to feature online multiplayer, Resident Evil: Outbreak File #2 adds a number of new features and five all new scenarios to the familiar formula.
results.name: Resident Evil: Outbreak - File #2

results.deck: Based on the popular Anime Series, Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2 is the sequel to Dragon Ball Z: Budokai, A Game developed by Dimps the Game includes brighter and better visuals and new costumes for each Character, it improves upon the ability to create Custom Characters in Edit Skills Mode.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2

results.deck: The ninja for hire Ayame, on a quest to find her master, suddenly stumbles upon a ruined village; its only survivor being a young assassin by the name of Rin. Together, the two work to uncover the plot behind the village's destruction, and the annihilation of Rin's clan.
results.name: Tenchu: Fatal Shadows

results.deck: Take freestyle football to another level in this trick-filled Fifa Street
results.name: FIFA Street

results.deck: Just like you always wanted, Jaws Unleashed grants you the opportunity to play as a shark in an open-world game.
results.name: Jaws: Unleashed

results.deck: Go for it! Climb to the top of the building as a helicopter awaits! A precursor to the platformer genre, Crazy Climber was the first game revolving around climbing.
results.name: Crazy Climber

results.deck: Second Sight is a game about an amnesiac psychic looking to uncover the secrets of his past and piece together the events that lead to his incarceration in a mental institution.
results.name: Second Sight

results.deck: A racing game with sprint cars
results.name: World of Outlaws: Sprint Car Racing 2002

results.deck: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus is a platformer that sees Sly Cooper and his gang on a mission to defeat the five criminals that killed Sly's family and reclaim the pages of the Thievius Raccoonus, a book of family thieving techniques compiled by generations of the Cooper family.
results.name: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus

results.deck: This sequel to a highly popular light gun shooter adds in two player co-op.
results.name: Time Crisis 2

results.deck: A game based on the children's movie of the same name.  Nothing really more to say on this one, except why the heck do the male cows have udders? That is just WRONG.
results.name: Barnyard

results.deck: Dynasty Tactics is a turn-based strategy game similar to the famous Romance of the Three Kingdoms series but with a stronger emphasis on tactical combat rather than the strategic and political machinations of Wei, Shu, and Wu.
results.name: Dynasty Tactics

results.deck: A third-person action game featuring Nina Williams from the Tekken series.
results.name: Death by Degrees

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 2 is a historical hack-and-slash game based on Luo Guanzhong's novel, "The Romance of The Three Kingdoms". It is unusual in being a different genre from the original Dynasty Warriors, which was a fighting game.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 2

results.deck: Fall version of The Baseball 2003.
results.name: The Baseball 2003: Akikigou

results.deck: Playboy: The Mansion is a Sims-style game that puts players in control of Hef's lifestyle and management of his magazine empire.
results.name: Playboy: The Mansion

results.deck: Set on Mars in the near future, Red Faction is a first-person shooter developed by Volition. It follows the fight of miners against the oppressive Ultor corporation and features dynamic destructible environments.
results.name: Red Faction

results.deck: Immerse yourself in some of the greatest Star Wars Battles ever!
results.name: Star Wars: Battlefront

results.deck: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror is a third person shooter for the PSP, it takes place after Syphon Filter: The Omega Strain. It is also the series' first appearance on the PSP.
results.name: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror

results.deck: The series returns again with sharper looking graphics and a slicker control scheme.
results.name: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007

results.deck: Frank Herbert's Dune is a 3D action game based on the TV mini-series
results.name: Frank Herbert's Dune

results.deck: NHL 2K3 is the third game in 2K's long running NHL series, and featured Philadelphia Flyer Jeremy Roenick on the cover.
results.name: NHL 2K3

results.deck: Urban Reign is an old-school style 3D beat-em-up game for the Playstation 2.
results.name: Urban Reign

results.deck: Ford Racing 3 is a racing video game published for the Game Boy Advance, Playstation 2, Xbox, Nintendo DS, Arcade and PC.
results.name: Ford Racing 3

results.deck: Ubisoft Shanghai brings the first sequel to the highly acclaimed videogame Splinter Cell, adding a brand new multiplayer component and new maneuvers such as the SWAT turn.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow

results.deck: Multi-platform Lotus licensed racing game from Kuju interactive, most notable for it's attempt at an innovative control system.
results.name: Lotus Challenge

results.deck: Sly 2: Band of Thieves follows the Cooper Gang as they attempt to recover the dismantled parts of Clockwerk from an international criminal organization known as the Klaww Gang.
results.name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves

results.deck: A futuristic racing game based on the movie the Fifth Element, released only in Europe.
results.name: New York Race
